titleStmt.title: The antidote: or, a seasonable discourse on Rom. 13. 1 Shewing the necessity and reasonableness of subjection to the higher powers. With an account of the divine right or original of government. By John VValker, M.A.
titleStmt.author: Walker, John, 1650-1730.
